TopicTitle: Please stop slowing time warp when I am running out of fuel

Articles.Content: I understand the idea, but it is really annoying on long burns. It slows the timewarp down minutes before the fuel runs out.  I am simply trying to orbit Kerbol. I have a 9 minute burn and then another stage. I don't need timewarp slowed until I actually run out of fuel. All this is doing is making me spend time.
